explain: The Wales vs Belgium Euro 2016 qualifier has been sold out, with 33,000 fans in attendance at the match held at Cardiff City Stadium on June 12.
Wales is looking to secure one of the two automatic qualifier spots in the Euro 2016 tournament against Belgium, aiming to achieve their best position since the 1958 World Cup finals.

Wales would rather play their crucial Euro 2016 qualifier against Belgium at Cardiff City Stadium. This indicates that the team and its fans prefer playing at a location with more support from the home crowd.
